name: Knockout-isotope
body:
### Knockout-Isotope
Knockout-Isotope is a [Knockout](http://knockoutjs.com/) binding that integrates with the [Isotope](http://isotope.metafizzy.co/) layout manager.

The binding makes it possible to visualize a Knockout observableArray as Isotope layout elements. See demo.html for a demonstration of the binding's functionality.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
